amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Yellow Ribbon Program by $15.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding for the Yellow Ribbon Program by $15.5 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Altmire amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
